title: Top (4th) floor penthouse,Decks,storage,Pkg/Laundry Av(166 Athol #402)
posting_body: ['3BR/2BA Top Floor Penthouse', '* $3,800/month annual lease', '* 2 decks *', 'Private in-unit storage', '* Views * laundry * Elevator', '* Parking at an additional fee', '* Sorry, no pets', '*', 'Available:', 'Now', 'OPEN HOUSE: Please call', 'show contact info', 'ADDRESS:', '166 Athol Ave #402 (Mask required)', '3BR/2BA, top (4th) floor penthouse has two decks and a fabulous view of the Oakland skyline.', 'Floor is shared with one other penthouse; access is restricted by elevator key.', 'Floors are hardwood except in tiled baths.', 'Large main deck is accessed via the huge, C-shaped living room via two pairs of sliding glass doors.', 'Galley kitchen fills the center of the C; a small "nook" to one side could be used as an office.', 'Kitchen includes dishwasher, microwave, electric stove and granite counters.', 'Very large, secure storage room is located at one end of the deck.', 'Expansive master bedroom has both walk-in and wall closets, as well as full bath with shower-over-tub.', 'Front bedroom has large deck with terrific view of the Oakland skyline.', 'Third bedroom is between front and master bedrooms.', 'Both bedrooms have folding door closets.', 'Shared is shower-over tub.', 'Apartment has an entrance area including closet.', 'Building has shared laundry and parking is available at an additional monthly fee.', 'Building is on a quiet residential street less than a block from Athol Plaza and Lake Merritt.', 'Shopping and dining district on East 18th Street is less than a block away.', 'Bus lines 14, 18, 26, 40 and 840 all within two blocks.', 'Everest Mwamba', 'DRE# 01717299', 'Kenney & Everest Real Estate', 'DRE# 01984640', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Apply at: <URL>', 'Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.']
